entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
